sentence.idiomatic: Nowadays people pay the most attention to new ideas; the more out of ordinary they are, the more attention they get.
I can't tell what the difference is between this piece of clothing and the others.
Never being arrogant is exactly what makes her different from others.
Her eyes are glittering with tears.
Her necklace sparkled radiantly under the sunlight.
Countless stars are sparkling radiantly in the night sky.
Diamonds can sparkle with an enchanting radiance.
She gradually lost her self-confident radiance on the stage.
The celebrities at the party sparkled with radiance.
This new product has two selling points.
The cheap price is the selling point of this car.
If a product has no good selling points, it has no value.
Getting celebrities to do advertisements? Your "innovation" is too common.
The creativity of integrating traditional with modern is really wonderful.
I really can't come up with any good creative ideas.
She is in charge of planning this activity.
Good planning is a prerequisite of putting on a good party.
Under her meticulous planning, the exhibition was very successful.
Many of her friends became professionals.
Do all females long to become professionals?
Actually white collar workers' lives' also have a lot of stress.
Although they are old, antiques are very expensive.
The latest fashions from Paris are extremely expensive.
I really can't afford such a costly residence.

word.literal: money that has been saved from living frugally

sentence.idiomatic: The money grandmother saves by living frugally she donates to the poor.
He is only pinching pennies in order to buy a car.
Nowadays even if young people live frugally they still can't afford to buy a house.
This season's key color is red.
Cell phones aren't our company's key product.
Proficiency in a foreign language or computers is the key talent for the new century.
The product we're presenting this time is ``Truly Beautiful" brand's imitation diamond jewelry.
Although it's not a real diamond, it has the same sparkling radiance. But the most exciting thing is the extremely accessible price.
``Truly Beautiful" makes owning a diamond is no longer just a fantasy. However, if you made this your selling point, it would be lack of creativity.
So, how to attract the eyes of the masses then? That is the focus of this ad campaign.
The slogan of our ad campaign is: “Truly Beautiful Imitation Diamonds—a man’s best friend”.
Our target consumer market is white-collar city dwellers. They will certainly all be familiar with the classic saying, “diamonds are a girl’s best friend”.
Certainly, diamonds can stir deep emotions, and are the best gift that a man can give to his beloved lady.
However, due to the fact that diamonds are very costly, in order to buy one a lot of men will have to pinch in pennies.
So our key market is those who long to own a diamond, but whose economic capabilities are limited.
Through the male perspective, our advertisement influences both the male and female, using this innovative and humorous approach.
Furthermore, its creativity sets it apart from other jewelry advertisements, giving it a significant advantage.
